dct_description_sm: Map of Dahomey showing cities, towns, villages, roads, railways, rivers, marshes, and other features in the region of Allada.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map, given in "Kilomètres" and "Milles marins."
Dressé et publié par le Service Géographique de l'Afrique Occidle. Française à Dakar. Héliogravé et imprimé par le Service Geographique de l'Armée à Paris.
dct_rights_sm: Image courtesy University of Cape Town Libraries, Special Collections: Maps scanned under the William and Yvonne Jacobson Digital Africana Program at UCT. If you have questions, please contact David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
